explanation: [0-0] In the hallway of a movie theater, Sadness, wearing a white sweater and blue pants with glasses, stands alone with his head down, looking unhappy. Behind him is the theater entrance, and there are decorations on the wall. The blue English caption "the beauty of friendship" is displayed on the screen.

[0-5] Then Joy, wearing a yellow dress and holding two movie tickets, walks in from the left side of the screen. She bounces happily, talking and gesturing to Sadness. The scene then shifts to Sadness standing in front of a small shop, where the lady smiles and tilts her head at him. Sadness turns around and walks forward, holding a cup of popcorn in both hands. He stumbles, spilling the popcorn on the ground. The lady in the shop covers her mouth in surprise, while Sadness stands helplessly, staring at the popcorn on the floor.
